articles.title: Xi Jinping suggests that U.S. panda programs could continue - POLITICO
articles.description: “I was told that many American people, especially children, were really reluctant to say goodbye to the pandas, and went to the zoo to see them off,” Xi said.
articles.content: Pandas have long been envoys of friendship between the Chinese and American peoples, Xi continued. We are ready to continue our cooperation with the United States on panda conservation, and do our be… [+1392 chars]

articles.author: Anthony Robledo
articles.title: American women are outliving men by 6 years since pandemic. But why? - USA TODAY
articles.description: The life expectancy gap between women and men in the United States expanded to 5.8 years between 2010 and 2021, the biggest difference in decades.
articles.content: The life expectancy gap between women and men in the United States expanded to 5.8 years between 2010 and 2021, the biggest difference in longevity between the sexes in decades, according to a new re… [+3001 chars]
